description: Yoshizawa is the other editor at Weekly Shounen Jump in http://anidb.net/a3468 [Gintama], the colleague of http://anidb.net/ch11692 [Konishi], who is responsible for the wildly successful C.Gray-man (Cクレイマン) and Pess Note. This is actually a cameo of Yoshida Kouji (吉田幸司), the other real-life Jump Editor for Death Note (complete series) and D.Gray-man.
name: Yoshizawa
